MAN.TITLE: plot3d1
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 3D gray or color level plot of a surface

PARAM.P: See plot3d for a full description. There is just a slight difference, only the sign of the flag(1)=mode parameter is used: if it is negative the grid is not drawn.

DESCRIPTION.P: plot3d1 plots a surface with colors depending on the z-level of the surface.
Enter the command plot3d1() to see a demo.
